[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@tridion-sites/extensions](./extensions.md) &gt; [SizeProps](./extensions.sizeprops.md)

## SizeProps interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface SizeProps
```

## Properties

| Property                                          | Modifiers | Type   | Description                                                                                                                                                  |
| ------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [height?](./extensions.sizeprops.height.md)       |           | number | _(Optional)_ Height of the component. Values higher than 1 are treated as pixels. Values less than or equal to 1 are treated as percentage. Zero is ignored. |
| [maxHeight?](./extensions.sizeprops.maxheight.md) |           | number | _(Optional)_ Maximum height of the component in pixels.                                                                                                      |
| [maxWidth?](./extensions.sizeprops.maxwidth.md)   |           | number | _(Optional)_ Maximum width of the component in pixels.                                                                                                       |
| [minHeight?](./extensions.sizeprops.minheight.md) |           | number | _(Optional)_ Minimum height of the component in pixels.                                                                                                      |
| [minWidth?](./extensions.sizeprops.minwidth.md)   |           | number | _(Optional)_ Minimum width of the component in pixels.                                                                                                       |
| [width?](./extensions.sizeprops.width.md)         |           | number | _(Optional)_ Width of the component. Values higher than 1 are treated as pixels. Values less than or equal to 1 are treated as percentage. Zero is ignored.  |
